data.message: I love the hearts flying all over...this should be a daily thing.... We need love everyday.... Thank you💖💕💗💘💞💝 Facebook 👌👍✌✊

replies.message: You're very welcome, Irene. Happy International Day of Peace! -Jessica
Agree! Love the little hearts. I could get used to that daily!
I am having way to much fun with the hearts!  I love them! :D
Why Fb want copy of my friends passport? IT just feels very very strange. Or is it not FB but some hacker?

Thanks for reaching out, Nina. You can confirm that you’ve been contacted by a Facebook representative by asking them to send you an email. Facebook representatives will have an @sales.fb.com, @support.facebook.com or @fb.com email address. All 3 email addresses are valid and only originate from authorized representatives of Facebook. Let us know if there’s anything else we can help you with. Thanks! -Jessica

Facebook  Hi Jessica. I will tell to my friend so he can contact them. Because it sounds more that strange that should send copies of passport and other ID. Same type of scams has been on Ebay, Paypal etc. Thanks
But why want copy of passport? That is very strange. Why i ask about it? Because he does not speak english that well

fb ...Please help me.. Do not ignore me. can see I send the message for you? 
https://youtu.be/3aAYUWBwsuE
